name: ashs
label: Penn Memory Center Hippocampus Volumetry Pipeline
description: Created by the gear builder. Edit the manifest file to give this gear a description!

t1.description: T1 weighted dicom or nifti file.

t2.description: T2 weighted dicom or nifti file.

DSSService.description: Segmentation service to use.  defaults to ASHS-HarP(1). May be one of ASHS-Magdeburg(2), ASHS-PMC-T1(3), ASHS-PMC-T2(4), ASHS-Princeton(5), ASHS-Utrect(6)

ProjectName.description: Project Name. Default found from gear manifest.

ScanID.description: Scan ID. Default found from dicom headers.

SessionID.description: Session ID. Default found from dicom headers.

author: Gaylord Holder
